akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 111–281, title II, § 208(b), Oct. 15, 2010, 124 Stat. 2912]

akn:content.akn:p:
[§ 70117. Repealed. Pub. L. 111–281, title II, § 208(b), Oct. 15, 2010, 124 Stat. 2912]
Section, added Pub. L. 108–293, title VIII, § 801(a), Aug. 9, 2004, 118 Stat. 1078, § 70118; renumbered § 70117, Pub. L. 109–241, title IX, § 901(l)(1), July 11, 2006, 120 Stat. 565; Pub. L. 109–304, § 15(33)(A), Oct. 6, 2006, 120 Stat. 1705; Pub. L. 110–181, div. C, title XXXV, § 3529(c)(1), Jan. 28, 2008, 122 Stat. 603, related to firearms, arrests, and seizure of property.
Editorial Notes Prior ProvisionsA prior section 70117 was renumbered section 70120 of this title. Another prior section 70117 was renumbered section 70119 of this title.
